name: Dungemoji
description:
This is my entry for Gynvael's Winter Game Dev Challenge 2017/2018. See https://gynvael.coldwind.pl/?lang=en&id=668 for more info.

Due to the heavy reliance on emoji's this is best viewed in Chrome on Windows 10.

Any other OS does not contain the intended emoji, and I am not allowed to distribute the Segoe UI Emoji font as it is owned by Microsoft.
